project.conceptDescription: High level description of the project and dont make it too long
project.heading: Showcase the ideas, the amibition, maybe include the location
project.body: Elaborate on the partnership and the tools that will be used, maybe discuss what the partner really wanted to achieve, what was driving the project, discuss what venues wasnâ€™t taken, ultimately wrap it up with an explanation what was selected and why

values.title: Get offensive
values.body: Explain how we help our partner put their revenue streams at risk with new digital offerings that reshuffle activities and business models

values.title: Digitize
values.body: Example of how we can helped partner to overinvest in digital technology relative to competition

values.title: Reframe
values.body: How we helped our client to use a wider lens to assess would-be competitors or partners

values.title: Reshape demand
values.body: A concrete example of how the Division enriched products and services with information, social content, and connectivity

values.title: Overhaul
values.body: How division helped client Rethink and rebuild legacy IT systems and cultural and strategic constraints
